org.openjdk.tools.javac.util

类 JavacMessages

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openjdk.tools.javac.util.JavacMessages
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Messages

    public class JavacMessages
extends Object
implements Messages
    Support for formatted localized messages.

    This is NOT part of any supported API. If you write code that depends on this, you do so at your own risk. This code and its internal interfaces are subject to change or deletion without notice.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static interface  JavacMessages.ResourceBundleHelper
      This provides a way for the JavacMessager to retrieve a ResourceBundle from another module such as jdk.javadoc.

      • getLocalizedString

        public String getLocalizedString(Locale l,
                                 String key,
                                 Object... args)
        从接口复制的说明: Messages
        Get a localized formatted string.
        指定者:
        getLocalizedString 在接口中 Messages
        参数:
        l - locale in which the text is to be localized
        key - locale-independent message key
        args - misc message arguments
        返回:
        a localized formatted string
